title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-2.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-2.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to any facility that performs
post-collection separation or processing of municipal solid waste to recover
recyclables or to produce a refuse-derived fuel. This Subpart also applies to
any combination of these activities. Post-collection separation does not
satisfy the source-separation requirements of General Municipal Law section
120-aa or local recycling laws or ordinances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
